Mod.Name: Magic Mirror - Cinema-RF Add-on (30fps)
Mod.Author: Kris2per + AxlRose
Mod.Description:
Magic Mirror focuses heavily on enhancing the faces and the eyes of main characters of FF8.
• All the images are enhance using stable diffusion. • Intro is slightly enhance visually. • Other than the intro, most of the enhancements are mainly focused on the faces and the eyes. • The faces are closely resembling the character portrait. • Videos are sourced mainly on the PSX videos, but also incorporated a rare video from the PSX demo. • Videos have been interpolated to 30fps, thanks to AxlRose.
